en.title: Application Scenarios
en.sceIntro_pri: PPIO can provide ways to match the file assets sellers and buyers, and handle transactions in a secure and reliable way, without requiring an intermediate party.
en.sceIntro_med: PPIO can provide ways to match the file assets sellers and buyers, and handle transactions in a secure and reliable way, without requiring an intermediate party.
en.sceIntro_ent: PPIO can provide ways to match the file assets sellers and buyers, and handle transactions in a secure and reliable way, without requiring an intermediate party.
en.sceIntro_exc: PPIO can provide ways to match the file assets sellers and buyers, and handle transactions in a secure and reliable way, without requiring an intermediate party.
en.sceIntro_dec: PPIO can provide ways to match the file assets sellers and buyers, and handle transactions in a secure and reliable way, without requiring an intermediate party.
en.sceIntro_war: PPIO can store a huge amount of  datasets, and replace traditional unreliable local data storage or expensive cloud storage.

zh.sceIntro_pri: PPIO can provide ways to match the file assets sellers and buyers, and handle transactions in a secure and reliable way, without requiring an intermediate party.
zh.sceIntro_med: PPIO can provide ways to match the file assets sellers and buyers, and handle transactions in a secure and reliable way, without requiring an intermediate party.
